name: BayaPay Sdn Bhd
description: Provider of a smart fuel fleet payment & fleet management platform intended to help commercial vehicle owners deter fraud, save cost, and digitize fleet management. The company offers a fully functional open-loop payment card to save money and stay ahead of the competition, enabling businesses to make secure payments within set limits and controls across all fleet-related expenses with ease.
one_liner: Provider of a smart fuel fleet payment & fleet management platform intended to help commercial vehicle owners deter fraud, save cost, and digitize fleet management. The company offers a fully functional open-loop payment card to save money and stay ahead of the competition, enabling businesses to make secure payments within set limits and controls across all fleet-related expenses with ease.
